Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Spiniferin (Ile-rich; natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA, UCLL1c; Derivatives: Spiniferin-M )

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 69.2% similar toscorpion Hp1036. Active against  B. megaterium AB 90008; M. luteus AB2010179 (MIC 41-82 uM);  E. coli DH5alpha (MIC 82 uM). Spiniferin-M, a peptide variant with E4K and D11N to increase the net charge by 3, showed stronger activity, especially against M. luteus (MIC 2 uM).  Provided by Xiuqing Wang.
Literature Information.Author: Wu S, Nie Y, Zeng XC, Cao H, Zhang L, Zhou L, Yang Y, Luo X, Liu Y.2014
Literature Information.Title: Genomic and functional characterization of three new venom peptides from the scorpion Heterometrus spinifer
